title: build: unknown datastore entity for old build failures
body:
Andrew,

I was reading https://github.com/golang/go/issues/6372#issuecomment-66085362 and clicked the link:

But http://build.golang.org/log/a09e574dfbb72c98721571ed8e87e634faeb7863 says:

"Error: datastore: no such entity"

Does the /log/ handler need to try the old hg namespace or something if the Git namespace doesn't have it?
